# Observatory Telegram Notifier

Telegram Notifier is an optional [plugin](/usage/plugins) for Observatory, designed to relay notifications to [Telegram](https://telegram.org/). 

## Installation

  * Make sure you already have Observatory Core [downloaded](/release).
      * Note: in earlier versions of Observatory, Telegram Notifier is included as a core plugin.
  * Navigate to https://edjp.colacube.net/observatory and download Telegram Notifier.
  * Double-click on the downloaded .eop file to install it into Observatory.
      * If installation was successful, you should see an 'Observatory Telegram Notifier' dropdown in the Core tab.
  * Telegram Notifier is now ready to use.

Note: In addition to the Telegram application itself, you will need a Telegram Bot API key to use this plugin.
